Interface DatatypeMapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDatatypeMapper

    public interface DatatypeMapper

    DatatypeMapper.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object getJavaObject(org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.Literal value)
      Returns a Java object reconstructed from the given RDF literal value.
      org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.Literal getRDFValue(Object value, org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.ValueFactory valueFactory)
      Returns an RDF literal representation of the given Java object.

    • Method Detail

      • getJavaObject

        Object getJavaObject(org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.Literal value)

        Returns a Java object reconstructed from the given RDF literal value.

        Parameters:
        value - RDF plain or typed literal
        Returns:
        Java object or null if the literal datatype is not supported.

      • getRDFValue

        org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.Literal getRDFValue(Object value,
                                            org.eclipse.rdf4j.model.ValueFactory valueFactory)

        Returns an RDF literal representation of the given Java object.

        Parameters:
        value - Java object
        valueFactory -
        Returns:
        RDF plain or typed literal, or null if the object class is not supported
